body_html: Maybe cudnn code path also has something that checks this, but it feels that these checks can be at ATen level since they are pretty general, e.g. here https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp#L156.
body_text: Maybe cudnn code path also has something that checks this, but it feels that these checks can be at ATen level since they are pretty general, e.g. here https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp#L156.
body: Maybe cudnn code path also has something that checks this, but it feels that these checks can be at ATen level since they are pretty general, e.g. here https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp#L156.
